title.narrative: Tanzania Agribusiness Window- Support to innovative business ideas in agribusiness, agribusiness value chains, and financial services in Tanzania.

description.narrative: This activity (Tanzania Agribusiness Window- Support to innovative business ideas in agribusiness, agribusiness value chains, and financial services in Tanzania.) is a component of Tanzania Agribusiness Window - Africa Enterprise Challenge Fund reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Not for profit organisation' and a budget of £19,049,992. This component benefits Tanzania, and works in the following sector(s): Agricultural development. , with the following implementing partners: AECF, Alliance for a Green Revolution in Africa. The start date is 07-03-2011 and the end date is 30-09-2022.

participating-org.narrative: Alliance for a Green Revolution in Africa

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Agriculture - Economic Affairs - Agriculture - policy, planning and administration
Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2015 Quarter 3
